titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that States and units of local government should enact legislation to prohibit the issuance of business, professional, or occupational licenses to unauthorized aliens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 3/14/2007--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that states and units of local government should enact legislation to prohibit the issuance of business, professional, or occupational licenses to aliens who are unlawfully present or not authorized to work in the United States.
